description: Targus Vuscape for iPad® 3Vuscape™Standing Up for ProtectionYour iPad is more than a multimedia tablet – it’s a portable theater, a radio, a means to connect with others. Vuscape is more than your average case. It’s lined with a premium, soft-to-the-touch interior material that protects your iPad from scratches. Vuscape is the thin and light solution for the everyday iPad user.Multiple Viewing AnglesWhether you’re sitting on a long flight or looking to get work done while in transit, using your iPad to watch a movie or type an email has never been easier. The Vuscape easily converts to three different viewing angles and a fourth sturdy typing angle for your comfort. Perfectly angled and positioned, the fourth angle keeps the iPad stable when typing on screen.Three different viewing anglesDeep grooves help support these viewing anglesWatch a movie or typePrecision-Cut Camera OpeningThey say a picture is worth a thousand words, but are you tired of having to take your iPad out of the case when taking a picture? The Vuscape has a precision-cut camera hole that prevents shadowing when taking pictures with your iPad for clear, unobstructed images. So capture pictures that last a lifetime with ease.Precision-cut camera openingTakes clear, unobstructedimagesTake pictures with your iPadin the caseIt's all in the DetailsTargus thought of all the little details when designing this case. With extra padding in the shell and a port hole that frames the Apple® logo, Vuscape was built with the sophisticated iPad user in mind. Always losing your stylus? The Targus Vuscape has built-in stylus storage on the front of the case so that you will always have your stylus handy when you need it.Extra padding in the shellFrames the Apple® logoBuilt-in stylus holderForm-fitting and ProtectiveThe Vuscape was built with a custom fit cradle to keep your iPad nice and snug while in use and in transit. With the durable exterior and a soft-lined interior, your iPad will also be protected from scratches and dust. The magnetic on/off feature helps conserve battery life by putting your iPad to sleep while not in use – there’s no need to press any buttons! And access to iPad ports? Not a problem – the form-fitting design allows you to have easy access without having to remove your iPad from the case. The Targus Vuscape is the perfect solution when you’re on the go.Durable exteriorSoft-lined interiorEasy access to ports.GreyNote { font-family : Helvetica; font-size : 9px; font-weight : bold; padding-bottom : 0px; title: Targus Vuscape Case and Stand for iPad 3 and iPad 4th Generation, Black (THZ157US)
